HELP: **to get film you can use /get_film film_name**
ADMIN_CMD:
**Here Are Commands for Admin Only: 

/status : Get Status 
/ban : For Banning User From Bot 
/unban : For Unban User From Bot 
/admin_cmd : This Message 
/broadcast : Send Message To All Users 
/sendto user_id : Send Message For Specific User 
/add_film : Adding Film To The DataBase 
/get_film : Get Film by name**
USAGE_SENDTO:
**You Must Reply This Command With user id on message for send it to the user. 
Example Usage: 
/sendto 9876543210**
ADD_FILM: **For Addin Film Just Send Film To The Bot, Then Reply This Command On It!**
FILM_NOT_EXIST: **There Is No Such Film In DataBase!**
BROADCASR_USAGE: **You Must Reply This Command on message to send it for all users!**
SEND_FILM_TAGS: **Send Some Tags To Add It On Film!**
NO_KEY_IN_DB: **There Is No Such Key In Database!**
UPDATE_INFO_USAGE:
**Usage: 
/update_info video_name key value 
Example: 
/update_info tmp file_name mpt 
/update_info tmp description 'hello world;)'**
